description: The notification sent when a sensor status event occurs

event.Summary: $v3 sensor event on device $v1 of type $v2; sensor value: $v4

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD OG-SENSOR-MIB::ogsensEventOccurred OG-SENSOR-MIB::ogsensStatusName s EXAMPLE OG-SENSOR-MIB::ogsensStatusDevType s EXAMPLE OG-SENSOR-MIB::ogsensStatusType s EXAMPLE OG-SENSOR-MIB::ogsensStatusValue i 9999

description: The name of the device pertaining to the status event
variables.name: OG-SENSOR-MIB::ogsensStatusName

description: The type of device pertaining to the status event
variables.name: OG-SENSOR-MIB::ogsensStatusDevType

description: The type of sensor pertaining to the status event
variables.name: OG-SENSOR-MIB::ogsensStatusType

description: The value of the sensor pertaining to the status event
variables.name: OG-SENSOR-MIB::ogsensStatusValue
